name: MeSnakeman
description:
COOL, FAST and CRAZY.

MeSnakeman is an arcade game that constantly tests your creativity as you play. The most important thing is having fun. Defeat yourself, fight your weakness using your skills. In the game you will find mechanisms known and liked from the classic Snake and much more. Find your own favorite way to play.

The game offers 2 game modes, 7 unique main levels, each of which gives new opportunities to play.


My first game, if you want to see the very first one, I invite you to play. There are super abilities and secret places available. I have much, much more in my plans, but I won't reveal any details now.

gl&hf Gamers!
